pkgmetadata.longdescription: Scalable Gaussian-Process Approximations // Fast scalable Gaussian process approximations, particularly well suited to spatial (aerial, remote-sensed) and environmental data, described in more detail in Katzfuss and Guinness (2017) arXiv:1708.06302. Package also contains a fast implementation of the incomplete Cholesky decomposition (IC0), based on Schaefer et al. (2019) arXiv:1706.02205 and MaxMin ordering proposed in Guinness (2018) arXiv:1609.05372.
